definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: belly (Aram. h.uwm4o0)—[[הַחׂמֶשׁ]] 2Sa 2:23 + 3 t.; ´[[אל־הח]]…[[וַיַּכֵּהוּ ]] 2Sa 2:23 and he smote him in the belly; 2Sa 20:10 + 2Sa 4:6, rd. [[וַתָּ֫נׇם]] [[וַתִּישָָׁן]] and she slumbered and slept LXX We Dr.; yet corruption difficult to explain, v. Klo; ´[[וַיַּכֵּהוּ שָׁם הח]] 2Sa 3:27 (where prob. ins. [[אל־]] cf. Dr).
